author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-2034. Length in DFSInputStream.getBlockRange(..) becomes -ve when reading only from a currently being written block. Contributed by John George

author: dkulp
msg: CAMEL-4057: fixed issue with multiple Exceptions thrown in a route when using .continued(true) exception handling

CAMEL-4057: Keep test as it was so the wiki example is the same and simple. Added 2nd test to test the issue with 2x continued. Added better validation that it was actually the 2nd exception that was caught at the end of the test.

author: hwright
msg: Rev the svn_stream_copy3() API and give it an argument which allows the caller
to specify the number of bytes to copy.

author: dkulp
msg: CAMEL-4076: Fixed idempotent consumer not being started/stopped when used on file/ftp endpoints.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2163 Changes to support building UIMA AS Deployment Descriptors dynamically.
